message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, I'm willing to negotiate!
I think 60-40 is not fair, how about we do 55-45?
I can do 57-43, it's a good compromise, don't you think?
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I think I deserve a bit more. How about 58-42?
Come on, 56-44 is a good deal, I'm starting to lose value here...
You're losing value, I'm not. I think 60-40 is a fair deal now.
